titles.title: Designating May 25, 1995, as "National Tap Dance Day".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1071)
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 5/25/1994--Introduced. Designates May 25, 1995, as National Tap Dance Day.
